amendment.description: Page 234, after line 1, insert the following (and redesignate subsequent sections, and conform the table of contents, accordingly): SEC. 801. STATE TAXATION. ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 112-46 to clarify Congressional intent of 49 U.S.C. 40116(d)(2)(A)(iv) to prohibit taxes on businesses located at an airport when such revenue is not used for airport purposes.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Graves (MO) amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Graves (MO).
